experience.title: Machine Learning Intern
experience.description: Project : Pedestrian Detection for day and night videos taken from Automotives using Convolution Neural Networkâ€¢ Trained the model in Pytorch framework on Caltech Pedestrian Dataset combined with data augmented images for Night modeâ€¢ Maximized Accuracy on Dev and Test set by using Drop-out Regularization (p=0.15) and Batch Normalization after every CNN layerâ€¢ Conserved Space of Model to 212 KB with the help of Deep Compression Model having simple Architecture and Pruning methodologyâ€¢ Reduced the RAM consumption to 3.5 MB during testing phase along with maintaining good accuracy in Test-setâ€¢ Boosted quality of performance by increasing the FPS to 23-25, used efficient Region Proposal algorithm along with using previous output
experience.description_html: Project : Pedestrian Detection for day and night videos taken from Automotives using Convolution Neural Networkâ€¢ Trained the model in Pytorch framework on Caltech Pedestrian Dataset combined with data augmented images for Night modeâ€¢ Maximized Accuracy on Dev and Test set by using Drop-out Regularization (p=0.15) and Batch Normalization after every CNN layerâ€¢ Conserved Space of Model to 212 KB with the help of Deep Compression Model having simple Architecture and Pruning methodologyâ€¢ Reduced the RAM consumption to 3.5 MB during testing phase along with maintaining good accuracy in Test-setâ€¢ Boosted quality of performance by increasing the FPS to 23-25, used efficient Region Proposal algorithm along with using previous output

projects.title: Multi-Agent Trajectory Prediction Under Shared Environment
projects.description: â€¢ Implemented Social LSTM paper in Pytorch which consider others influence in Target trajectory by Social pooling of Hidden statesâ€¢ Analyzed Spatially Aware Deep Attention Model which also accounts for Static Environments and uses Spatio Temporal Attention Modelâ€¢ Examined Scene LSTM paper having Scene Model and Scene Data Filter which had generated Non-Linear trajectory predictionsâ€¢ Explored 10 more papers, mainly having Bi-Directional LSTM, Dynamic Pooling, Motion/Location Encoder, Context Aware LSTM .etc

organizations.title: Net Impact Organization
organizations.description: Net Impact is a non-profit membership organization for students and professionals interested in using business skills in support of various social and environmental causes. It serves both a professional organization and one of the largest student organizations among MBAs in the world.

honors_and_awards.title: Reward & Recognisation at Amazon - Sept 2023
honors_and_awards.description: Migration of SOA-EU from RAMP/CP to Mataveri is top priority for RVS org. We identified multiple blockers to start end-to-end testing for SOA-EU KYC onboarding and verification. In the month of Sept Himanshu worked on multiple P0 issues and showed great ownership while fixing those issues to unblock end-to-end testing. He was incrementally finding issues during his testing of new Claim based APIs in Bourscheid and fixed those issues. He also successfully executed a test plan for these APIsâ€¦ Show more
